item.title: Getting started
item.description: If you’re working on a new Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF) project, an older project that wants to revamp its site and docs, or a project that’s not affiliated with the CNCF at all, you can deploy a project by: Installing dependencies Cloning the Docs in a Box repo Creating a new repo for your project Run the site locallt Setting up Netlify Install dependencies macOS brew install hugo Make sure to install the version of Hugo specified in the netlify.
